message.content:
cs.NI, cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM

This paper deals with the optimization of mode selection and resource allocation in fog radio access networks, which is a topic related to network infrastructure and communication technologies. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also proposes reinforcement learning algorithms to solve the optimization problem, which falls under the category of machine learning. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely category. The paper involves the use of mixed-integer programming and subchannel allocation strategies, which are related to information theory and optimization. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) is another possible category. The paper also deals with the joint optimization of multiple objectives, which is related to control systems. Hence, cs.SY (Systems and Control) is another possible category. Finally, the paper involves simulations to validate the proposed algorithms, which is related to multimedia. Therefore, cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a possible category.
